title: Poor Veigar
body: It is a shame, League has been one of my favorite game for about 3 years now and it showed promise for keeping it that way for many years to come. Sadly this all changed when the people in charge of tweaking and balancing champions have single-handedly changed this from being my all time favorite game into one that I am bordering on hating. For a game with so many resources at their disposal their seems to be an issue with finding out the real issues with balance. It has an enormous fan base and yet the team seems to take delight in ignoring any and all negative feedback they get. Take the Veigar changes for example, I have not seen ONE post with a positive outlook on the changes made to his stun. Effectively he has been left dead in the water with no real CC unless the enemy team decides they want to give this one to him and leisurely walk into his ring. I know that the general sheep following will stick around because they have been told the game is popular, and I do not imagine this will change anything, but I am pretty close to leaving. You have been nerfing and changing champions like Zilean, Janna, Soraka, Veigar etc... The list goes on. The only thing you seem to think are balanced are the champions that the majority of the community has issues with like Yasuo, Zed, Le Blanc, Fizz and all those other people that are lending themselves to the "League of Assassins" meta that is currently rife in league. The simple fact that you have a champion that can one man an entire enemy team, while not having any sort of gold advantage speaks volumes to the fact that your prioritizing incorrectly. Please for the love of god, shift focus onto the champions that are actually in need of balancing and leave those that are underplayed as it is alone. An alternative is to send out emails to accounts older than 2 years that have gone innactive when the balance team has figured out that the things going clunk in the corner are actually the broken bits in the game that are presently not working.
